name: Fairytales Of Nature (Archive)
description:
Once upon a time, there were five tribes. After many wars, they ended up working together in a peacful way. But many challenges harmed their harmony. You, an 18 years old boy, need to figure out on how to move through and survive in this world.

I recommend you to first take the peacful/friendship route, then the violent/mass murder route, then the neutral/ignorant route.

This is a text-based game (and there will be A LOT of text...at most parts it might be similar to reading a book) where you can choose your actions and go on different routes with different outcome (the choice of route is made at the beginning, however). I hope you'll enjoy the game.

Any images from the game header aren't likely in the game, as it is a console game.

#textadventure #rpg #adventure #retro
